summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby, Harry Beller, and Vahe Stepanian regarding positions at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It includes a note about an error in financial reporting that needs correction.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is the sender of the email.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is the sender of a forwarded email to Amanda Kirby regarding positions and a financial error.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is included in the email correspondence as a recipient.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is copied on the email sent by Amanda Kirby.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller are both associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, with Amanda being the recipient of Harry's email.
Amanda Kirby includes Vahe Stepanian in her email correspondence regarding positions at Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby copies Paul Morris on her email, indicating a professional relationship within Deutsche Bank.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: The email was sent by Amanda Kirby on September 12, 2013.
Harry Beller mentions an error in financial reporting related to JPY that needs correction.
The document is classified as confidential and for internal use only.
